name: Add a new record into a table in Airtable from a new feature in ArcGIS Field Maps
description:
Every time a new feature is created in ArcGIS Field Maps, a new record will be created in a table in Airtable.

Note that the template works with a sample Debris map described in [this article.](https://www.esri.com/arcgis-blog/products/field-maps/field-mobility/automate-email-notifications-for-field-updates/)

The template expects your Airtable table to have these fields:
1) detail as text
2) name as text
3) phone as text
4) email as text
5) longitude as text
6) latitude as text
